mission: Create `/outputs/CASE_STUDY_RUBRIC.md` with inclusion/exclusion criteria, tagging taxonomy (workstream, evidence type, jurisdiction/date), and a scoring rubric; then use it to select/confirm the 3 pilot claims and document why they qualify.
